snippet.title: Pocket Oasis Trailer
snippet.description: We are developing Pocket Oasis. Pocket Oasis is a gardening simulator that is completely hand drawn with watercolor. Players can play short sessions or lose themselves in hours of gardening. The game utilizes real-life weather and plant-growing data. That way, the players can find out if their pineapple will grow in London.
